about_the_game:
Abyss is an arcade-adventure game telling the story of a teenager who sets off on a dangerous and obstacle-filled journey. Take part in this thrilling adventure, explore 21 different levels, from the gloomy streets of Łódź to the infernal dungeons. You will be lead by the guide all the way, which will help you to complete all tasks. This one will not be easy...

Key Features:
  • Hours of action-packed gameplay
  • Reactive voiceover creates a dense storyline
  • 3 different worlds to explore and come back to
  • 21 unique levels
  • Upgradable weapons
